scripts.dev:api: npm run build:libs && npm run start:dev -w services/api
scripts.dev:worker: npm run build:libs && npm run start:dev -w services/worker
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:worker
scripts.build:libs: cd libs/common && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd ../db-orm && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:api: npm run build:libs && npm run build -w services/api
scripts.build:worker: npm run build:libs && npm run build -w services/worker
scripts.build: npm run build -w services/api && npm run build -w services/worker
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=worker
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=api && npm run typecheck --workspace=worker
